Name: PUTIN IN JAIL
About the game: Dictator and war criminal Vladimir Putin is behind bars. Game 'Putin in Jail' is a criminal simulator. Your goal is to make the main character survive. About gameplay: VP has many parameters. Weight. See that he does not lose weight or gain weight. You can see it visually. Exercise to control your weight. Mood. If the character fails at something, he loses points. Hunger. If you keep him hungry he will hold his stomach, slow and in a bad mood. Toilet. If you don't go to the toilet, your stomach will hurt and you will be in a bad mood. If you catch flies and cockroaches, you will be given cigarettes. Smoking reduces hunger and improves mood. There is a real-time day and night change with the ability to rewind while sleeping. They give out food 3-4 times a day. If you don't put the leftovers back, the next time the food will be bad. There is a radio with publicly available music.
